text.0: may the wind blow upon our cows with healing may they eat herbage full of vigorous juices.
text.1: may they drink waters rich in life and fatness to food that moves on feet be gracious rudra.
text.2: likecoloured varioushued or singlecoloured whose names through sacrifice are known to agni.
text.3: whom the aṅgirases produced by fervourvouchsafe to these parjanya great protection.
text.4: those who have offered to the gods their bodies whose varied forms are all well known to soma.
text.5: those grant us in our cattlepen o indra with their full streams of milk and plenteous offspring.
text.6: prajāpati bestowing these upon me oneminded with all gods and with the fathers.
text.7: hath to our cowpen brought auspicious cattle so may we own the offspring they will bear us.
